attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that the Prime Minister RHT HON Gordon Brown MP may have acted Inappropriately , along with other members of his cabinet in his recent approach to the financial situation in the UK.  There are now serious questions in relation to funds being made available to certain financial institutions. In the light of which we the undersigned have no confidence in his government and petition the Prime Minister  to call a General Election without further delay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
